<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Resounding Blow](/Feats.aspx?ID=5850) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 82 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Requirements**
You are wielding a melee weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

</column>

---

You strike your enemy in the head with such force that its ears ring. Make a melee Strike. If the Strike hits and deals damage, the target is [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=66) until the start of your next turn (or for 1 minute on a critical hit).
name: Resounding Blow
requirement: You are wielding a melee weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.
